formattedAddress: 555 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 555 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Forward has been absolutely fantastic over the past two years.  Their doctors are at the top of there game and are professional, thorough and compassionate.  They patiently listen, ask questions, address concerns providing  effective advice and solutions.  I have learned so much about how to stay healthy through my in person appointments and their follow up telehealth visits. Dr. Glenn Kashan has been an absolute Godsend.  He has really made a profound impact on my health, as he is the first doctor that has managed to motivate me to stay healthy through diet, exercise and living a healthy lifestyle. Dr. Kashan is an exceptional clinician as he has been proactive in identifying potential problems in order to stay ahead of them. His thoroughness and followup is unmatched.  This is preventive primary care at it's best.  When I needed routine tests or specialized care Forward helped find the best within my insurance plan. Their staff is always professional and incredibly responsive to messages and  coordinating referrals. I am really thankful to have found Forward as I am confident that they will be instrumental in keeping me healthy for many years to come.

originalText.text: Forward is a promising service, but for what it costs: $1200/per year, it does not deliver as I would have liked. Been a member since 2018. I thought it would provide more than what it does. There's a lot of bells and whistles, but where is the value? Hard to put a finger on it....I'm dropping the service for now until I see some changes and improvements.

originalText.text: We have been with forward for a few years now and nearly all the time they get it right. Are they perfect…no, but who is. Thru covid they were always open. If you manage your healthcare, forward is a great add-on. Video calls, live visits and the APP… im so glad i use this service

originalText.text: The doctors are excellent. The location is great, new , clean, well design. With the subscription you also get a 24/7  chat where they direct your questions to great doctors and book appointment in case of emergency.

text.text: The doctors are excellent. The location is great, new , clean, well design. With the subscription you also get a 24/7  chat where they direct your questions to great doctors and book appointment in case of emergency.

originalText.text:
I cannot say enough good things about Forward, Especially Dr. Kashan and Dr. Singh. The level of care, compassion, listening and KNOWLEDGE is unmatched by any doctors I’ve ever been to. The support staff is extraordinary.

It does take some mental shifting to get used to the 100% app based communications, but the team is so responsive, you quickly appreciate NOT BEING ON HOLD for hours or having messages left in machines unanswered (like with most practices).

I know I sound like a commercial— but I implore you, Do yourself a huge favor and join forward. It is the best investment in your health you can make.

text.text:
I cannot say enough good things about Forward, Especially Dr. Kashan and Dr. Singh. The level of care, compassion, listening and KNOWLEDGE is unmatched by any doctors I’ve ever been to. The support staff is extraordinary.

It does take some mental shifting to get used to the 100% app based communications, but the team is so responsive, you quickly appreciate NOT BEING ON HOLD for hours or having messages left in machines unanswered (like with most practices).

I know I sound like a commercial— but I implore you, Do yourself a huge favor and join forward. It is the best investment in your health you can make.
